messages.message: @Cheryl Zhou what was the fix here? We're seeing similar fs errors in https://natwest.aihub.instabase.com/
Oh this: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/64113 ~I think the fix might have missed 24.44~ :grimacing:
Ahh no, it's actually in the 24.44 release
@Pridhvi Vegesna Did they just upgrade to 24.44?
I see that their default creds are with access key pairs, so they shouldn't be impacted by the above change :thinking_face:

Oh I think it's because of this patch? https://natwest.aihub.instabase.com/deployment-manager/configs?targetObject=deployment-core-platform-service We should flip the  USE_AWS_ACCESS_CREDS field back to False
cc @MK If the flipping of the env var is intentional, then the access key pairs are not valid
HI @Cheryl Zhou I have flipped that env var for access key and secret key are not being rotated, to test we have flipped it. I have deleted the patch now
